imdb.plot outline: A disgraced psychiatrist uncovers a demonic web while treating a mentally disturbed young woman. Using drug-fueled hypnosis, the psychiatrist unleashes dormant supernatural powers within the young woman. Family secrets are revealed. But at a deadly cost. The psychiatrist begins to lose his grip on reality as magic and surreal mayhem seep into the souls of everyone he encounters, leading up to an explosive showdown with the young woman's mother who unleashes her witchcraft on them.
imdb.title: Suffer a Witch
plot: After a tragic death during a one-night-stand, a drug-addicted psychiatrist takes a job treating a disturbed young woman who murdered her father. Using unconventional hypnotism therapy, he unleashes a demonic force within the young woman.

The psychiatrist begins to lose his grip on reality as magic and surreal mayhem seep into the souls of everyone he encounters, leading up to an explosive showdown with the young woman's mother who unleashes her witchcraft on them.
